quote: I brug you two [gifts] . . . I gots the little here in my pockie.' He dug one hand deep into his pocket and pulled out a handful of nuts and a dead grasshopper. 'Nope. Be the other side.' (Matt)
quote_letters: I BRUG YOU TWO GIFTS    I GOTS THE LITTLE HERE IN MY POCKIE HE DUG ONE HAND DEEP INTO HIS POCKET AND PULLED OUT A HANDFUL OF NUTS AND A DEAD GRASSHOPPER NOPE BE THE OTHER SIDE MATT
